Content: One more phase of the ongoing mental wellness project that has been devised by the Directorate of Psychological Operations at the Army Headquarters to elevate spiritual standards as well as mental peace among hardworking tri-service Officers and Other Ranks, got underway at Dekatana, Helummahara, Bawunseth Siyane International Vipassana Bhavana Centre on Monday (9). 34 Army personnel attended the meditation programme, conducted by its Chief Incumbent Ven. Diyasenpura Wimala Thero, an eminent meditation practitioner. The programme continued throughout the day.
